remarks:
Totality of the ordering relation on integers, stated in terms of upper integers.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Jul-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jun-2013.)

 Trichotomy of the ordering relation on integers, stated in terms of upper integers.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Jul-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jun-2013.)
statement: uztric $p |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) \/ M e. ( ZZ>= ` N ) ) ) $.
